Projects.title: Machine-Demo-Using-VR
Projects.subtitle: University of South Australia, Adelaide, South Australia

attributes.label: Objective
attributes.description: Help Future Industry to demonstrate their latest in-line coating techs to their potential customers (usually located overseas/interstate)

attributes.label: Duties
attributes.description: Co-Developer in a dual developer group. I was in charge of writing the animation scripts in C#. Those scripts run in the backend and animate the 3D objects in the Application.

attributes.label: Outcome
attributes.description: We developed an app that works on PC (with HTC VIVE), IOS and Android

attributes.label: Result
attributes.description: Obtained a Distinction for the project

Projects.title: Web Navigation and Question-Answering
Projects.subtitle: University of Adelaide, Adelaide, South Australia

attributes.label: Objective
attributes.description: Assist elderly individuals and those with visual impairments in navigating a shopping website to easily find and access what they need.

attributes.label: Duties
attributes.description: Co-Developer in a dual developer group. I was in charge of collecting data and generating training data by using ChatGPT API.

attributes.label: Outcome
attributes.description: We developed an agent that runs on Windows and navigates to the desired website based on a given prompt.

attributes.label: Result
attributes.description: Obtained a Distinction for the project
